TestCase.Title: Test case TLS_A1_GP_03_T
TestCase.Purpose: This test verifies that the offered Supported Groups extension matches the declaration in the ICS. Furthermore, a TLS connection is possible.
TestCase.Precondition: The test TLS server is waiting for incoming TLS connections on [URL].

Command.Text: The tester causes the DUT to connect to the TLS server on [URL].

ExpectedResult.Text: The TLS server receives a ClientHello handshake message from the DUT.
The TLS ClientHello offers the highest TLS version stated in the ICS.
The NamedGroup extension contains the domain parameters stated in the ICS in specified order.

Command.Text: The TLS server answers the DUT choosing a valid TLS version, a cipher suite supported by the ICS and domain parameters [GROUP].

TestStep.Description: The TLS server supplies the certificate chain [CERT_DEFAULT].
No TLS extensions are supplied by the server which are not required to conduct the TLS handshake.

ExpectedResult.Text: The TLS protocol is executed without errors and the channel is established.
